option.name: No startup or default libs (-nostdlib)
Size format
option.tip: Choose whether the output from gnu size resembles output from System V size (using -A, or --format=sysv), or Berkeley size (using -B, or --format=berkeley). The default is the one-line format similar to Berkeley's.

option.name: Hex
option.tip: The size of each section is given in hexadecimal.

option.name: Show totals
option.tip: Show totals of all objects listed (Berkeley format listing mode only).
